Title: Welcome
Text: Welcome to YouTD2! In this game you will defend against waves of creeps by building towers.

Title: Tower Stash
Text: Towers you can build will appear in the [color=GOLD]tower stash[/color]. Note that no towers are available at the moment.

Title: Elements
Text: Tower stash is separated into sections with one section per element. To switch to a different element, press on one of the [color=GOLD]element buttons[/color].

Title: Research Elements
Text: Before you can start building towers, you need to research your starting elements. To research an element, press [color=GOLD]upgrade[/color] button.

Title: Element levels
Text: Each element has a research level. Researching the same element multiple times will unlock more powerful towers.

Title: Roll starting towers
Text: After you have researched desired elements, press the [color=GOLD]roll[/color] button to get your starting set of towers.

Title: Knowledge tomes
Text: Note that you need to spend [color=GOLD]knowledge tomes[/color] to research elements. At the start of the game you have enough tomes to research 4 times. You can obtain more knowledge tomes by completing waves.

Title: Rolling towers during the game
Text: Note that the [color=GOLD]roll[/color] button will go away once you build a tower. Towers will get rolled automatically after each wave.

Title: Build a tower
Text: To [color=GOLD]build a tower[/color], press on a tower in the tower stash. Then move your mouse to the game world and press on where you want to build. Building zone is highlighted with blue.

Title: Build a tower
Text: To [color=GOLD]build a tower[/color], press on a tower in the tower stash. Then move your mouse to the game world and press on where you want to build. Building zone is highlighted with blue.

Title: Gold
Text: Building towers costs [color=GOLD]gold[/color]! You can obtain gold by defeating creeps.

Title: Items
Text: In this game, you can power up your towers with items and oils which are dropped from creeps. They will appear in the [color=GOLD]inventory[/color].

Title: Items
Text: You have a starting pack of 1 item and 1 oil in your inventory. Try to use them on your built tower.

Title: Horadric Cube
Text: When you have too much items, you can merge them together in the [color=GOLD]Horadric Cube[/color]. There are 4 possible recipes how you can use the cube.

Title: More Hints
Text: You can find more hints about the game in the [color=GOLD]pause menu[/color]. Press [color=GOLD]Esc[/color] to pause the game (after the tutorial is over).

Title: The end
Text: The tutorial is over. The game will start once you close this window. Good luck!
